issue.title: www.list.am
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.list.am/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.list.am%2F) ### Comment > Этот сайт площадка объявлении типа Авито. Проблема в том, что при включенном adguard невозможно писать что-то на поле поиска. А при отключенном adguard раздражает окно выбора языка. Если блокировать окно выбора языка, невозможно будет писать в поле поиска. Хотелось, что сайт автоматический выбрал армянский язык и не спрашивал каждый раз, но сайт мой выбор не помнит, я в режиме инкогнито пользуюсь, но выбор языка на не приватной окне вопрос не решает. > > Достаточно посетить этот сайт и блокировать элемент (окно) выбора языка, и невозможно станет писать в поле поиска. Хотелось, чтобы адгуард убрал этот окно выбора языка и что там возможно было писать, а то не реагирует на клавиатуру, нужно добавить /am, /ru или /en на конце list.am, чтобы опознал наш выбор языка и позволил писать, непрактично так. Может вы найдете решение? С отключенным адгуард сайт работает, но вскакивает окно выбора языка. Блокиратор рекламы Опера на результат не влияет. Это из за адгуард и из за плохой настройки сайта лист.ам. > > Спасибо заранее. Username: `@Рафаэль` ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/qz5dmj2fz400ckgkw0o0w484sow0gw0sov64vut6tc.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/mdzjagp7zms08wok8co48kg4c4k0k046y08gm9fj5c.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.3.14 System version: | Linux x86_64 Browser: | Opera Stealth mode options: | Block WebRTC,

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
> It looks like the exception is needed on DNS-level. Add it to the DNS user rules.
> 
> ```
> @@||startup.mobile.yandex.net^|
> ```
> 
> Note, that it might unblock ads on other apps.

Злойдень, добрый.
Это было мое обращение, по которому Служба поддержки создала здесь это обращение.
Ваш ответ применим только если человек пользуется приложением Adguard.

Мое обращение было о том (странно, что служба поддержки его исказила), что если пользоваться ПУБЛИЧНЫМИ профилями Adguard, например, на роутере или поставить его на уровне iOS, то они тоже блокируют приложение "Все аптеки". Приложения Adguard я НЕ ИСПОЛЬЗУЮ. Соответственно, куда вносить исключения? Ответ - только на уровне настроек профилей DNS на вашей стороне.

И это проблема ломает не только приложение Яндекса "Все аптеки", но иногда вызывает проблемы с приложением "Едадил", но по нему вроде как уже все нормально последние недели.

Соответственно топовое приложение "Все аптеки" от топового разработчика "Яндекс" ломается на уровне вашего DNS.
Вывод: мне кажется, это требует однозначного исправления на уровне общих настроек вашего dns, т.к. никакими другими способами это исправить нельзя, кроме как покупать приложение и вносить исключения - не думаю, что обычные рядовые пользователи не сильные в IT будут так усложнять себе жизнь.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Bug
labels.description: The issue is caused by a program bug

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172881#issuecomment-1958754655 по этому поводу лучше оформить репорт в соответствующем [репозитории](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardSDNSFilter/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc).
Лично не думаю, что этот рекламный сервер будет исключен из нашего днс сервера - это повлечет за собой разблокировку рекламы во многих приложениях.
Помимо этого, есть еще несколько вариантов:
- использовать приложение AdGuard и внести это исключение в модуль DNS - пользовательские правила
- использовать наш нефильтрующий днс
- использовать [приватный днс](https://adguard-dns.io/ru/welcome.html), в котором вы можете сами разблокировать этот рекламный сервер
- обратиться к разработчику приложения.

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/173124#issuecomment-1956962363 - Ten problem dotyczy tylko wersji beta i jest to związane z tym - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2723

Jako tymczasowe rozwiązanie dodaj proszę te reguły:
```adblock
/^(http|https):\/\/www\.wp\.pl\/[a-zA-Z0-9-_]{50,}/$popup,domain=www.wp.pl,badfilter
/^https:\/\/[a-z.]{2,17}\.wp\.pl\/[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{450,}/$popup,domain=www.wp.pl,badfilter
```
do reguł użytkownika.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Bug
labels.description: The issue is caused by a program bug

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Bug
labels.description: The issue is caused by a program bug

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

issue.title: Getting rid of JS rules, used to set a cookie

labels.name: Infrastructure
labels.description: Related to the repository infrastructure

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

We have ~317 JS rules, used to set a cookie. They can be found by:
`document.cookie =`
They must be replaced by `set-cookie` / `set-cookie-reload` / `trusted-set-cookie-reload` scriptlet rules.

There are many old rules, so first you need to check if the site is available, and then the need for the rule.

* For convenience, you can work in a separate browser
* Retrieve the list of domains, clean up duplicates and check if sites exist (if redirects occur, we assume that the site is dead).
* All such rules can be merged into one file, convert them to exception rules and import as custom filter. Then go down the list and check if the rules are needed (other types of problems not related to these rules are skipped).
* If the site is dead - add domains in the comment below. Then we will remove them from the filters.

In order not to overlap with other filter maintainers, it is desirable to perform batch rule replacement via pull-requests (5-10 rules per PR).

### Important
It should be checked with a Dutch or German VPN, because otherwise the cookie usage messages may not appear.

pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Closes #173318

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.title: Getting rid of JS rules, used to set a cookie

labels.name: Infrastructure
labels.description: Related to the repository infrastructure

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

We have ~317 JS rules, used to set a cookie. They can be found by:
`document.cookie =`
They must be replaced by `set-cookie` / `set-cookie-reload` / `trusted-set-cookie-reload` scriptlet rules.

There are many old rules, so first you need to check if the site is available, and then the need for the rule.

* For convenience, you can work in a separate browser
* Retrieve the list of domains, clean up duplicates and check if sites exist (if redirects occur, we assume that the site is dead).
* All such rules can be merged into one file, convert them to exception rules and import as custom filter. Then go down the list and check if the rules are needed (other types of problems not related to these rules are skipped).
* If the site is dead - add domains in the comment below. Then we will remove them from the filters.

In order not to overlap with other filter maintainers, it is desirable to perform batch rule replacement via pull-requests (5-10 rules per PR).

### Important
It should be checked with a Dutch or German VPN, because otherwise the cookie usage messages may not appear.

comment.body: Dead domain: `filebase.ws`

pull_request.title: Remove JS rules used to set a cookie - 2024 Feb 22 part 4

issue.title: Getting rid of JS rules, used to set a cookie

labels.name: Infrastructure
labels.description: Related to the repository infrastructure

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

We have ~317 JS rules, used to set a cookie. They can be found by:
`document.cookie =`
They must be replaced by `set-cookie` / `set-cookie-reload` / `trusted-set-cookie-reload` scriptlet rules.

There are many old rules, so first you need to check if the site is available, and then the need for the rule.

* For convenience, you can work in a separate browser
* Retrieve the list of domains, clean up duplicates and check if sites exist (if redirects occur, we assume that the site is dead).
* All such rules can be merged into one file, convert them to exception rules and import as custom filter. Then go down the list and check if the rules are needed (other types of problems not related to these rules are skipped).
* If the site is dead - add domains in the comment below. Then we will remove them from the filters.

In order not to overlap with other filter maintainers, it is desirable to perform batch rule replacement via pull-requests (5-10 rules per PR).

### Important
It should be checked with a Dutch or German VPN, because otherwise the cookie usage messages may not appear.

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

comment.body:
Steps:
1. Go to `chrome://extensions/`
2. Open AdGuard details
3. Open `background.html`

	![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/8361299/93bc8741-7cfc-4cc2-8924-5942474cbd5a)

5. Open console in `background.html` window and enter `chrome.storage.local.get(console.log)`, then press Enter
6. Then copy the object like on the screenshot

	![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/8361299/789cfd3f-a5fb-4ccb-96c0-470ae9d14978)

7. Paste it to a text editor, pack to ZIP and upload here.

issue.title: www.list.am

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.list.am/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.list.am%2F) ### Comment > Этот сайт площадка объявлении типа Авито. Проблема в том, что при включенном adguard невозможно писать что-то на поле поиска. А при отключенном adguard раздражает окно выбора языка. Если блокировать окно выбора языка, невозможно будет писать в поле поиска. Хотелось, что сайт автоматический выбрал армянский язык и не спрашивал каждый раз, но сайт мой выбор не помнит, я в режиме инкогнито пользуюсь, но выбор языка на не приватной окне вопрос не решает. > > Достаточно посетить этот сайт и блокировать элемент (окно) выбора языка, и невозможно станет писать в поле поиска. Хотелось, чтобы адгуард убрал этот окно выбора языка и что там возможно было писать, а то не реагирует на клавиатуру, нужно добавить /am, /ru или /en на конце list.am, чтобы опознал наш выбор языка и позволил писать, непрактично так. Может вы найдете решение? С отключенным адгуард сайт работает, но вскакивает окно выбора языка. Блокиратор рекламы Опера на результат не влияет. Это из за адгуард и из за плохой настройки сайта лист.ам. > > Спасибо заранее. Username: `@Рафаэль` ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/qz5dmj2fz400ckgkw0o0w484sow0gw0sov64vut6tc.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/mdzjagp7zms08wok8co48kg4c4k0k046y08gm9fj5c.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.3.14 System version: | Linux x86_64 Browser: | Opera Stealth mode options: | Block WebRTC,

comment.body:
Здравствуйте. К сожалению, мы не можем добавить в основной фильтр правило, которое скрывает важное функциональное окно, но я могу предложить вам правило для пользовательского фильтра, чтоб сайт открывался на армянском языке в режиме инкогнито. Правило, блокирующее это окно можно будет удалить из фильтра.
`list.am#%#//scriptlet('trusted-set-cookie-reload', 'lang', '2')`

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [X] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [X] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

`https://suaurl.com/getlink/880fb9`

Both filters prevent the link from opening.
